entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
